title: Ep. 775 Is the FBI Hiding This Damaging Information?
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the devastating information the FBI and the DOJ may be hiding in the FISA application. I also address some suspicious behavior by the Mueller probe.
 
News Picks:
What the media isn’t telling you about the Russian collusion hoax. 
 
Does this Democrat senator know anything about our immigration laws? 
 
Whatever happened to the “unmasking” scandal?
 
This is a solid opinion piece about the depths of the FBI collusion in the Trump probe.
 
Why isn’t Paul Manafort taking a plea deal? 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
